          <title>
            <string language="de">Zum Reeducation-Film "Frischer Wind in alten Gassen"</string>
            <string language="en">On the reeducational film "Frischer wind in old Gassen"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sur le film de reeducational "vent de Frischer 
dans vieux Gassen"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na película de "vento do reeducational Frischer 
em Gassen velho"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sulla pellicola "vento di reeducational di 
Frischer in vecchio Gassen"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στην ταινία "αέρας reeducational Frischer σε 
παλαιό Gassen"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En la película "viento del reeducational de 
Frischer en viejo Gassen"</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Kritische Auseinandersetzung mit einem Zeitungsbericht von 1952 über den Reecucation-Film "Frischer Wind in alten Gassen".</string>
            <string language="en">Critical controversary on a newspaper report from 1952 dealing with the re-educational film "Frischer wind in alten Gassen/ Fresh wind in old alleys".</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Controversary critiques sur un état de journal 
de 1952 traitant le film re-éducatif "vent de Frischer alten dedans 
le vent frais de Gassen/ dans de vieilles ruelles".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Controversary críticos em um relatório do 
jornal de 1952 que tratam da película re-educacional de "vento 
Frischer alten dentro o vento fresco de Gassen/ em aléias velhas".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Controversary critici su un rapporto del giornale
da 1952 che si occupa della pellicola re-educativa "vento di Frischer 
dentro alten il vento fresco di Gassen/ in vecchi vicoli".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κρίσιμος controversary σε μια έκθεση εφημερίδων από
το 1952 που εξετάζει την επαν-εκπαιδευτική ταινία "αέρας 
Frischer μέσα Gassen/o φρέσκος αέρας στις παλαιές αλέεσ".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Controversary críticos en un informe del 
periódico a partir de 1952 que trata de la película re-educativa 
"viento de Frischer adentro alten el viento fresco de Gassen/ en 
viejos callejones".</string>
          </description>
